node.excerpt: This episode was one of the best in both seasons. Ishigami for the win! I need a spin-off series for his character! The shoujo part at the…
It’s done. Quite the documentary, out of a movie. Speaking from a viewer who hasn’t followed any basketball, I loved it. I knew of Micheal…
As they were showing the backstory of Steve Kerr I was like… Not interested. But it cracked me up on when, right after winning the NBA final…
How good can this guy get? He goes to play baseball for 21 months and he’s able to come back and win the NBA Final next year.  Glad to see…
Poor Seri-kun, must be hard to have such high maintenance friends. The kiss scene when he’s unconscious was quite funny. Equally funny was…
